snippet: Alec Baldwin’s arrest this week points to a larger issue that disproportionately hurts young New Yorkers.
abstract: Arrest of Alec Baldwin for riding his bicycle wrong way down Manhattan's Fifth Avenue and being unable to produce identification highlights larger issue that many young New Yorkers face of not having proper photo ID; common problem is often due to fact that young people who do not own cars never bother to get driver's license.
lead_paragraph: Alec Baldwin’s arrest this week points to a larger issue that disproportionately hurts young New Yorkers.

headline.main: Many People in City Lack Proper ID, Lawyers Say
headline.print_headline: Many People in City Lack Proper ID, Lawyers Say
